column3:
> Hopefully this won't cause regressions with Trusty.

Apparently not. Travis RPC tests still pass.

For reference this is upstream issue https://github.com/libevent/libevent/issues/326, which was fixed upstream in https://github.com/libevent/libevent/commit/79b69d8  and is part of the [2.1.6](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/libevent/libevent/release-2.1.6-beta/ChangeLog) release\n
